snippet.title: Ugly Button Adventure Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Ugly Button Adventure Full Walkthrough (Magikelle Studio)

Ugly Button A Way Out is a point and click adventure game released in May 2023 by Magikelle Studio where you solve puzzles and quests to escape room.

This is an amazing hand-drawn point-and-click adventure of an old rag doll named Ugly Button, who finds himself in an unknown slymobilegaming place and must somehow get out of there, escape from the room. To do this he has to collect lost parts of the puzzle and sovle many quests.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magikelle.uglybutton

#uglybuttonadventure
#脱出ゲーム 
#slymobilegaming 
#magikellestudio
#escapegames
